headline: International Flavors & Fragrances (NYSE:IFF) Reports Mixed Q4 2025 Results with Revenue Beat, EPS Miss
summary: IFF's Q4 2025 results beat revenue estimates but missed on earnings. The company provided 2026 guidance amid strategic divestitures and a focus on core business growth.

headline: International Flavors (IFF) Q4 Earnings: How Key Metrics Compare to Wall Street Estimates
summary: The headline numbers for International Flavors (IFF) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended December 2025, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: International Flavors (IFF) Q4 Earnings Miss Estimates
summary: International Flavors (IFF) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -5.37% and +3.09%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: International Flavors & Fragrances’s (NYSE:IFF) Q4 CY2025 Sales Top Estimates
summary: Flavor and fragrance producer IFF (NYSE:IFF) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q4 CY2025, but sales fell by 6.6% year on year to $2.59 billion. The company expects the full year’s revenue to be around $10.65 billion, close to analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.80 per share was 3.8% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: International Flavors: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results did not meet Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of five analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 85 cents per share. The ingredients producer for food, cosmetics and consumer products industries posted revenue of $2.59 billion in the period, which topped Street forecasts.

headline: Intl Flavors & Fragrances Q4 Adj. EPS $0.80 Misses $0.83 Estimate, Sales $2.589B Beat $2.514B Estimate
summary: Intl Flavors & Fragrances (NYSE:IFF) reported quarterly earnings of $0.80 per share which missed the analyst consensus estimate of $0.83 by 3.26 percent. This is a 17.53 percent decrease over earnings of $0.97 per share
